title: Phase One Trade Deal Signals `Cease Fire'
itunes:title: Phase One Trade Deal Signals `Cease Fire'
description:
Stefan Selig, Managing Partner at BridgePark Advisors, and David Riedel, President of Riedel Research Group, discuss how the U.S., China trade deal could impact both the political and investment environments. One thing they both agree on is that the Phase One deal does not address structural issues in the Chinese economy.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
